##### Let's start with a few words about myself:

I am a 27 years <s>old</s> young man who lived in Brussels for the past 20 years. As far as I can remember, I've always had a "thing" for languages. I guess that it's what brought me here on this journey. But languages are just one of my many interests. Music and travelling (when possible, of course) are also a big part of my life. 
If you want to know a bit more about myself, I invite you to go through this page to get to know me a little better.

***
As far as I can remember, the future, and everything that can eventually be part of it, is the only fear i've ever had.
> "The only place that fear can exist is in our thoughts of the future. It is a product of our imagination, causing us to  fear things that do not at present and may not ever exist. That is near insanity."

What Will Smith is trying to explain with this **quote** is that fear (in general) shouldn't exist, except for the one of the future. As fear only is a product of our imagination.

#### Expectations towards the future:

Even though we've just started this journey, I cant wait to dive a little more into these future challenges.
